title: One Week Later
subject_group: Family, Gender Identity, Relationships & Sexuality/School children
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/School children
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/School violence
Family, Gender Identity, Relationships & Sexuality/School violence
Education, Instruction, Teaching & Schools/Schools - Great Britain
abstract: This school based drama cleverly details intricate events that are played out in just one week of the school year.
description: Told through the eyes of a younger pupil, who surveys the relationships his brother has with his peer group. As revelations and misunderstandings occur, due to the misuse of the ubiquitous mobile phone, the week's events come to a climax on a Friday afternoon.
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: VoD Program; B2002794; Britain's First Light; Active; 2013
